title: How much is $500 a week hourly? - Quora

response.answer_text: How much is $500 a week hourly? If you are capable, do some grade 5 math: $500 divided by the number or hours you work = Hourly pay. If you work 40 hours/ week it is below minimum wage If you work 20 hours /week it is somewhat ok, but with some skill development you could do better. For me, this is less than a day’s pay.
